```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gpxhelpers)

## Run Data_Prep.R if new tracks have been added
project <- "Pike Chain Area"
dat <- read.csv(file.path("c:/aaaPersonal/MAPPING",project,"Data",
                          paste0(project,".csv")))
```

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=7, out.width="100%"}
allTracksMap(dat)
```

#### Notes

* <span style="color: #CC0000">Red</span> is highway, <span style="color: #336666">Blue</span> is paved road, <span style="color: #CC6600">Orange</span> is gravel road, <span style="color: #CC9900">Yellow</span> is offroad (ATV but possible 4WD vehicle), <span style="color: #999933">Green</span> is trail (hiking but some ATV).
* Hover on track to see track abbreviation.
* Click on track to get track information.
* Use +/- in upper-left to zoom.
* Use object in upper-right to change base map type.
* Use object in lower-left to make measurements on map.
